name: example
description: When you have the code open in your IDE, open the terminal and run either npm start or npx @11ty/eleventy --serve, and then run npm run dev. This should provide you with a link to the website, which will be something like localhost:8080. The header should have a dropdown menu that allows you to navigate to either the instruction page or the deliverable, which includes all the answered requirements as well as the write-up. For the pros and cons, just click on it, and a dropdown tab will show you the information. My references are at the bottom; just click on the links to view the sites. I have two markdown files, instructions.md and deliverable.md, both located within a folder called lab one in my src directory.
author: Jaden Parris, 100774161
